resource.sql: SELECT * FROM SYS_RES WHERE SYSTEMID=1 AND PARENTID=${PARENTID} ORDER BY SN
resource.template: insert into SYS_RES (RESID, RESNAME, ALIAS, SN, ICON,PARENTID, DEFAULTURL, ISFOLDER, ISDISPLAYINMENU, ISOPEN, SYSTEMID,PATH) values (${RESID}, '${RESNAME}', '${ALIAS}', ${SN}, '${ICON}',${PARENTID}, '${DEFAULTURL}', ${ISFOLDER}, ${ISDISPLAYINMENU},${ISOPEN}, ${SYSTEMID}, '');

resource.sql: select * from sys_lan_res order by RES_ID asc
resource.template: insert into SYS_LAN_RES (ID, RES_ID, LAN_TYPE, LAN_MSG) values (${ID}, ${RES_ID}, '${LAN_TYPE}', '${LAN_MSG}');
insert into sys_language(ID, LANGUAGE, ISDEFAULT, MEMO) values(${ID}, '${LANGUAGE}',${ISDEFAULT},'${MEMO}');
insert into SYS_SCRIPT (ID, NAME, SCRIPT, CATEGORY, MEMO) values (${ID}, '${NAME}', '${SCRIPT}', '${CATEGORY}', '${MEMO}');
